Label: ZBRB16
Comment: Name of GeneProduct (ZFP145) is only know for Rattus norv.; found ortholog through Ensemble (1-to-1 mapping, name is ZBRB16 for Homo sap. )

Label: KRTs
Comment: (1) Hoxc13 directly regulates expression of the hair keratin genes such as K32, K35 and K37, and of the transcription factor Foxq1

Label: HOXC12
Comment: (1, 2, 3 & 4) mx, cuticle, cx and md</br>(1) As embryonic hf morphogenesis reaches completion (P9), expression of the Hoxc13 is detected in the hair-shaft forming compartments of the matrix, cuticle, cortex and medulla.</br>(1) Hoxc13 directly regulates expression of the hair keratin genes such as K32, K35 and K37, and of the transcription factor Foxq1.

Label: HOXC13
Comment: (1, 2, 3 & 4) mx, cuticle, cx and md</br>(1) As embryonic hf morphogenesis reaches completion (P9), expression of the Hoxc13 is detected in the hair-shaft forming compartments of the matrix, cuticle, cortex and medulla.</br>(1) Hoxc13 directly regulates expression of the hair keratin genes such as K32, K35 and K37, and of the transcription factor Foxq1.
